Package com.sun.spot.security.implementation

This package contains the implementation specific classes, which are not part of the SATSA specificiation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ECDSASignature  
ECDSAWithMD5Signature  
ECDSAWithSHA1Signature  
ECKeyImpl  
ECPrivateKeyImpl  
ECPublicKeyImpl  
MD5  
ModuloExponentiation This class allows modulo exponentiation for odd moduli as used in the RSA algorithm.
PseudoRand Implements a pseudo random number generator. * Warning: This method is not part of the Security and Trust Services API (SATSA) 1.0 specification.
RSAKey Implements RSAKeySpec with methods to set and get RSA exponent and modulus.
RsaMd5Sig Implements RSA MD5 Signatures.
RSAPrivateKey Specifies the RSA private key interface.
RSAPublicKey Specifies the RSA public key interface.
RsaShaSig Implements RSA SHA1 Signatures.
SecureRandom The RandomData abstract class is the base class for random number generation.
SHA  
Util This class defines some static utility methods.
 

Package com.sun.spot.security.implementation Description

This package contains the implementation specific classes, which are not part of the SATSA specificiation.
